name: Match Maker: World Geography Facts
overview: Matchmaker World Geography is a new curriculum-based learning program that has been teacher designed to develop and strengthen knowledge of geographic facts. It will support most global geography courses taught in schools. The program is versatile and easy to use. It requires no previous computer background. Matchmaker World Geography works on the principle of matching words and phrases. It is excellent for expanding and reinforcing factual knowledge of global geography. Matchmaker World Geography also has a unique authoring feature which lets you create your own programs, quizzes and games simply by typing your entries on the computer keyboard.
